prompt: A magical swamp scene revealing a hidden grove that's partially shrouded in mist. The grove is illuminated by dozens of tiny, glowing will-o'-the-wisps of various colors, hovering above the water and around the twisted, ancient trees. The ground is a tangle of roots and vines, with bioluminescent flowers peeking through. There are faint mystical symbols glowing from within the tree bark, adding an enigmatic charm to the grove. The artwork is vibrant yet dark, capturing the enchanting and mysterious nature of the swamp at twilight.
